comments.body: You could also just include this in the recipe dir for simplicity in future.
It also appears the next release will [include its LICENSE](https://github.com/gwik/geventhttpclient/commit/04f9f606d1623823a6ce639043c1af0fd98454a2) in the source distribution.

diffHunk:

    sha256: bd87af8854f5fb05738916c8973671f7035568aec69b7c842887d6faf9c0a01d
